snippet: A problem in configuration at any step can cause a disconnect between a digital TV’s sound and picture, which are transmitted together but are separate streams of data and are processed separately.
abstract: Science Q&A on why sound and picture temporarily go out of synch on televisions receiving a digital signal via antenna.
lead_paragraph: A problem in configuration at any step can cause a disconnect between a digital TV’s sound and picture, which are transmitted together but are separate streams of data and are processed separately.

headline.seo: Why Digital TV Images and Sounds Sometimes Don’t Sync
